title: Professional on-site management team, 2 Playgrounds, Library
posting_body: ['WELCOME HOME TO PARK VILLAGE IN CONROE, TX', 'Our selection of 2, 3, and 4 bedroom apartments for rent in Conroe, TX are as affordable as they are stylish and comfortable.', 'Each home at Park Village Apartments includes many sought after features such as an external storage unit, oversized closets, and a full-size washer and dryer connection.', 'With a variety of floor plans available, there’s a perfect layout no matter your lifestyle.', 'Select units are two-story townhomes, offering even more space and privacy.', 'And with two community playgrounds, swimming pool and a clubhouse on site, Park Village has everything you need to live life to the fullest while staying within your budget.', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'More unit details at:', '<URL>', 'This is a 4 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1360 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Mirrored closet doors*', '- Oversized closets', '- Breakfast bar', '- Private apartment entrance', '- Furnished apartment options', '- En-suite bathroom', '- Full-size washer and dryer connections', '- Dishwasher', '- Townhome-style floor plans*', '- Private patio', '- Ceiling fan', '- Wood-style flooring', '- Refrigerator with ice maker', '- Additional Storage Units', 'Community Amenities', '- Professional on-site management team', '- Library', '- Conroe Independent School district', '- 2 Playgrounds', '- 24-hour emergency maintenance', '- Share the air: Smoke-free community', '- Clubhouse', '- 2 on-site laundry facilities', '- Close to historic Downtown Conroe', '- Swimming pool with large deck', '- Pet friendly puppies and kittens welcome (breed restrictions apply)', 'Pet Policy', 'DEPOSIT: $300 deposit per pet', 'FEE: $200 per pet', 'PET RENT: $20/month per pet (2 max allowed)', 'Pet Overview:', 'Dogs and cats, including puppies and kittens under 1 year old, are welcome at our community.', 'All pet residents must have their health check and shots, and be spayed or neutered by 6 months of age.', 'A signed animal addendum is required to be on file at our leasing office.', 'Two (2) max pets allowed.', 'Income Requirements:', 'Current Income Limits', '1 person: $33,300', '2 people: $38,040', '3 people: $42,780', '4 people: $47,520', '5 people: $51,360', '6 people: $55,140', '7 people: $59,980', '8 people: $62,760', '9 people: $66,528', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Tuesday:10:00AM-6:00PM', 'Wednesday:11:00AM-6:00PM', 'Thursday-Friday:10:00AM-6:00PM', 'Park Village Apartments', '1400 S. Frazier Street, Conroe, TX, 77301', 'Photos on this ad may not reflect all floorplans.', 'Advertised pricing and availability are subject to change without notice and cannot be guaranteed.', 'Photos on this ad may not reflect all floorplans.', 'Advertised pricing and availability are subject to change without notice and cannot be guaranteed.', 'K2txIn9w']
